channel.title: Hoster needed
channel.description:
Hey there, I'm an experienced java coder , have bin coding PS over 2 years. I want to start a new project and i need a hoster for it. Hoster will get 60% of the incommings.
On my last project i made a total in 3months of 295$. Lets say im good at advertising / making member&payment options :)
if ur intrested add me on my e-mail. icepkerz_owner@live.com
It must be at least 20/6 online Greetings,

item.title: Hoster needed
item.dc:creator: @danimaster danimaster
item.description:

i want a hoster too lol…but prob is i donno y it wont work on my pc :S

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster needed
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:6, topic:259683”]Why can’t people just host it themselves? What’s the point? It wouldn’t really be your server if other people host it. They will have the power to shut off your server whenever they wish and they wouldn’t have to give the server back to you if they didn’t want to… It would all be under their power.[/quote]you can just leave them the class files so that they can’t edit it and it will still run fine. I don’t like hosting because it lags. My computer is shit, but i still host stuff anyways =\

Read full topic

item.title: Hoster needed

item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Taharok:

1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked.

Unfortunately since this is not a server problem it does not belong here, and therefore it will be locked.
